job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pWere hiring for a rapidly growing series A startup who are developing an autonomous vehicle using shared autonomy The companys platform combines robotics computer vision and machine learning and its here to revolutionize their 12 billion marketppbrppTheyre looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to design and deliver their new autonomous vehicleppbrppIf you are passionate about cutting edge machine learning robotics and having realworld impact  this could be the place for youppbrppYou willpulliDesign and train neural networksliliDesign train and verify robust machine learning systemsliliProvide technical leadershipliliWrite maintainable code design software and deploy machine learning modelsliliCollaborate with other members of the teamliulpbrppYou havepulliPhD or Masters degree in Computer Science or related fieldliliExperience in reinforcement learning machine learning or optimization theorylili3 years of handson experienceliliExpertise with deep learning frameworks PyTorch Tensorflow KerasliliExperience developing machine learning systemsliliExpertise in Python and CliliExcellent communication skillsliulpbrppbrppemBig Cloud is acting as a vendor to this position which is a direct hireemp
